name: Eggo (itch)
description: Eggo is a game about 2 eggs, racing eachother to occupy the last slot of the egg carton in the fridge! Run faster than your local partner, but not too fast or you'll trip! Each time you trip you'll take damage and run slower, giving you a permanent debuff for the stage. Trip 3 times or hit an obstacle and you'll break open! Don't worry though, stages are short so you'll quickly get back to playing this fun little game!
